author: jerenkrantz
msg: Add 'exclude_paths' option to make it far easier to lists paths that should not
be triggered for a particular subsection instead of demanding admin regexp foo.
(Config:_prep_groups): Grab 'exclude_paths' option from config and store that
(Config:which_groups): For a match, if we have an exclude pattern and it
matches, do not add this repos to the groups to send email to.
